Reviews.Title: Very Pleased.
Reviews.Author: Bill Roudebush
Reviews.Content: The camera is wonderful. My only complaints are the bag is to small and don't even try and use the tri-pod. Tri-pod is made of plastic and not strong enough to hold the camera with all the extras on it. I knew that would probably be the case. I have made great use of everything else and would have had to purchase them if they did not come with the camera.

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: Dissenter "There is no knowledge that is not ...
Reviews.Content: First off this camera is amazing. Yea you can get this camera and lens kit from lots of places, but this is practically like getting a ton of add on items for free. Quality of some of the add on items is a bit low, but when they are giving it away, who cares. The battery grip is not bad at all and beats paying $200 for the Cannon one. Spare battery and filters are a must and the camera bag works for small trips to keep this kit safe. Note, you aren't going to fit much more than the camera and the 24-105mm lens in that bag.

<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
